* ggplot(df, aes(fitted_probability, binary_class_indicator)) +
geom_smooth(): a quick way of visualizing model calibration without having to manually bin any observations

* Rule of thumb for bins in histogram: `ggplot() + geom_histogram(aes(x), binwidth = diff(range(x)) / (2 * IQR(x) / length(x)^(1/3)))`.
